title: KyloCode :: Development Stream - 9/18/15

replies.body:
Nice stream.
Although I wish I knew something about coding so I could understand what was going on xD
replies.body_tagged:
Nice stream.
Although I wish I knew something about coding so I could understand what was going on xD

replies.body:
A basic wrap-up of the stream:
- Free For All was worked on
- Junior Mapdevs now have /d
- New arcade gamemodes coming
- New YAML system
- Fixed some bugs
- Discussed prestiges (may return)
- Discussed blocklag (fixed in next update?)
- 30% off sale on the server next update
- Little tiny Q&A, multiple topics

replies.body: I just watched it and it was great! Maybe kylo and I can make another stream while being on ts :)

replies.body: That was really cool tbf, I learnt alot. Thanks Kylo!
